mapper.select: select n.notice_no, t.member_type, n.critical_check, n.name, n.view_count, n.register_date from member_type t left outer join notice n on t.member_type_no=n.member_type_no order by notice_no desc

select n.notice_no, t.member_type_no, n.critical_check, n.register_date, n.view_count, n.name, n.content, n.modify_date from member_type t left outer join notice n on t.member_type_no=n.member_type_no where notice_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update notice set member_type_no=#{memberTypeNo}, critical_check=#{criticalCheck}, name=#{name}, content=#{content}, modify_date=#{modifyDate} where notice_no=#{no}
